game.name: Movie Date
game.description:
You will experience lots of love in the air when you play this brand new girls game in your device. Today these cute couples have planned to go outside and have fun by watching a movie together. Your favorite princesses Anna and Elsa need your help to get ready for their lovers Kristoff and Jack. Would you come forward to help both the princesses to pick up the perfect outfits? Join Movie Date and be prepared to create awesome dresses for these two gorgeous girls!

Remember it is their first date so try to mix and mix as many outfits as you can before leaving their homes for the movies. When you click the play button, the game starts with their conversation. Their common interest is to watch movies so all is ready except her dresses. Start with Anna and then move to the Elsa in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! Give your first girl a purple top and a pair of matching high heels and do not forget to combine it with a bow in her hair and a pair of white jeans!

You can choose a gorgeous look with a pink color glitzy top and pair it with lovely denim short and sparkly round earrings for the second girl. A beautiful strapless blue outfit with ruffles combined with a pearl necklace and a pair of cool and shiny shoes can also help her to create a fabulous look. Try to put your best to create the looks that could help them to impress their lovers on their first date in this cool dress-up game!
